sentences.sContent: In industry, a worker who is grossly insubordinate is threatened with discharge.
sentences.sCn: 在企业界，拒不服从指令的工人面临被解雇的威胁。

remMethod.val: in(不) + subordinate(服从的) → 不服从的

trans.tranCn: 不顺从的, 不听话的
trans.tranOther: If you say that someone is insubordinate, you mean that they do not obey someone of higher rank
